ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Newbie Here
ygData.msgSnippet: Keri I am going to be in north qeynos play a ranger and use the tracking skill to locate me easier. use the t letter to enter tell mode and then type in the
ygData.messageBody:
Keri

I am going to be in north qeynos play a ranger and use the tracking skill to locate me easier. use the "t" letter to enter tell mode and then type in the name of the charactor you wish to talk to.  when they reply you can use the letter "r" and you will be in the reply mode.

 

 jesus4metx@... wrote:

Hi everyone.  I just got the game Everquest and am so confused!  I read through the manual and can get around but how do you cast spells, talk to people around you, etc.??  I'm about to give up lol.  I'd tell you my characters name but I can't remember. :)  She is in the first world though.  Thanks ahead of time for any advice/help you can give me!
Keri

Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
